org.apromore.canoniser

Interface Canoniser

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Plugin, PropertyAwarePlugin
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultAbstractCanoniser

    public interface Canoniser
extends PropertyAwarePlugin
    Interface to an Apromore canoniser. Each canoniser is build as a OSGi plugin and has to implement this interface.
    Author:
    Felix Mannhardt (Bonn-Rhein-Sieg University oAS)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PluginResult canonise(InputStream nativeInput, List<org.apromore.anf.AnnotationsType> annotationFormat, List<org.apromore.cpf.CanonicalProcessType> canonicalFormat, PluginRequest request)
      Converts the data in native format to the canonical format and its annotation format.
      PluginResult createInitialNativeFormat(OutputStream nativeOutput, String processName, String processVersion, String processAuthor, Date processCreated, PluginRequest request)
      Creates an initial (empty) document of the supported native process format.
      PluginResult deCanonise(org.apromore.cpf.CanonicalProcessType canonicalFormat, org.apromore.anf.AnnotationsType annotationFormat, OutputStream nativeOutput, PluginRequest request)
      Converts the data in annotation format and canonical format to the native format.
      String getNativeType()
      Type of the native format which this canoniser can handle.
      CanoniserMetadataResult readMetaData(InputStream nativeInput, PluginRequest request)
      Reads just the meta data from the native process.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.apromore.plugin.PropertyAwarePlugin

        getAvailableProperties, getMandatoryProperties, getOptionalProperties

      • Methods inherited from interface org.apromore.plugin.Plugin

        getAuthor, getDescription, getName, getType, getVersion

    • Method Detail

      • getNativeType

        String getNativeType()
        Type of the native format which this canoniser can handle. For example "EPML 2.0" or "YAWL 2.2"
        Returns:
        the type of the native format

      • canonise

        PluginResult canonise(InputStream nativeInput,
                    List<org.apromore.anf.AnnotationsType> annotationFormat,
                    List<org.apromore.cpf.CanonicalProcessType> canonicalFormat,
                    PluginRequest request)
                      throws CanoniserException
        Converts the data in native format to the canonical format and its annotation format.
        Parameters:
        nativeInput - stream of the native format
        annotationFormat - list to which the canonized Annotations are added
        canonicalFormat - list to which the canonized Canonical Processes are added
        request - containing additional parameters
        Returns:
        a PluginResult with information about this operation
        Throws:
        CanoniserException - in case of an Exception during conversion

      • deCanonise

        PluginResult deCanonise(org.apromore.cpf.CanonicalProcessType canonicalFormat,
                      org.apromore.anf.AnnotationsType annotationFormat,
                      OutputStream nativeOutput,
                      PluginRequest request)
                        throws CanoniserException
        Converts the data in annotation format and canonical format to the native format.
        Parameters:
        canonicalFormat - Canonical Process Type to deCanonise
        annotationFormat - Annotations to deCanonise
        nativeOutput - stream of the native format
        request - containing additional parameters
        Returns:
        a PluginResult with information about this operation
        Throws:
        CanoniserException - in case of an Exception during conversion

      • createInitialNativeFormat

        PluginResult createInitialNativeFormat(OutputStream nativeOutput,
                                     String processName,
                                     String processVersion,
                                     String processAuthor,
                                     Date processCreated,
                                     PluginRequest request)
        Creates an initial (empty) document of the supported native process format.
        Parameters:
        nativeOutput -
        processName -
        processVersion -
        processAuthor -
        processCreated -
        request - containing additional parameters
        Returns:
        a PluginResult with information about this operation

      • readMetaData

        CanoniserMetadataResult readMetaData(InputStream nativeInput,
                                   PluginRequest request)
        Reads just the meta data from the native process.
        Parameters:
        nativeInput - stream of the native format
        request - containing additional parameters
        Returns:
        a CanoniserMetadataResult
